channel.title: Welcome to Wrexham on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to Wrexham on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Ryan Reynolds Donates to 13-Year-Old Welsh Girl Battling Rare Cancer to Visit New York City
item.description: With his GoFundMe pledge, the Hollywood star and Wrexham AFC co-owner will help the young ‘Home Alone’ movie fan possibly visit the Rockefeller Christmas tree this holiday season.

item.title: Ryan Reynolds Donates to 13-Year-Old Welsh Girl Battling Rare Cancer to Visit New York City
item.description: With his GoFundMe pledge, the Hollywood star and Wrexham AFC co-owner will help the young ‘Home Alone’ movie fan possibly visit the Rockefeller Christmas tree this holiday season.

item.title: ‘Necaxa’ Review: Eva Longoria’s FXX Mexican Soccer Docuseries Lives in the Shadow of ‘Welcome to Wrexham’
item.description: The Ryan Reynolds- and Rob Mac-produced project, which focuses on a struggling squad in Mexico, is one in a recent wave of series about celebrities investing in sports teams.
